prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
The document discusses issues with the quality of metal jewelry and components in the current economic crisis. Key points:

- There is an increase in fraudulent and harmful jewelry on the market as people try to save money.

- Customers have been reporting problems and scams encountered with jewelry purchases both in the Czech Republic and abroad.

- Korálky Katlas prepared a summary of things to watch out for when buying finished jewelry and jewelry components.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: metal jewelry, quality issues, economic crisis, fraudulent jewelry, harmful jewelry, customer complaints, scams, Czech Republic, jewelry purchases, Korálky Katlas, buying tips, finished jewelry, jewelry components
